originalText.text: I was having typical charging port issues with my iPhone XS, so I brought it in to get fixed. He repaired it within an hour, and I came and picked it up no problem. He is quick and efficient and has very friendly service. I would definitely recommend

text.text: I was having typical charging port issues with my iPhone XS, so I brought it in to get fixed. He repaired it within an hour, and I came and picked it up no problem. He is quick and efficient and has very friendly service. I would definitely recommend

originalText.text: Nick, and the staff at UNO Communications are absolutely amazing! Professional, knowledgeable, and super friendly.  I brought my phone in (after going to my cell phone provider, who told me I needed a new phone - when all that was needed was a new battery charging port) - and Nick immediately put me at ease and told me that they would replace the port for the battery charger.  They ordered the part for my specific phone - since they did not have it in stock - and a few days later, I had a phone that charged and worked without any issues! Fast, reliable, and not expensive! Highly recommended in every single way!

text.text: Nick, and the staff at UNO Communications are absolutely amazing! Professional, knowledgeable, and super friendly. Highly recommended in every single way!
